3D LOTTO RESULT July 15, 2020 – The 3D Lotto draws are held today by the Philippine Charity Sweepstakes Office (PCSO) at 11AM, 4PM, and 9PM and here are the results: 11am: Draw Suspended4pm: Draw Suspended9pm: Draw Suspended Due to the declaration of President Rodrigo Duterte of the Enhanced Community Quarantine PCSO Suspends Lottery Draw.
